description: Cyberduck bookmarks are saved in an XML format and contain the server address, directory path, port, protocol, and login information. They can created by selecting Bookmark → New Bookmark within Cyberduck. Bookmarks can also be dragged to and from the Bookmarks window.
In Mac OS X, Cyberduck bookmarks are saved in the following folder:
Recent connections are also saved as bookmarks in the following folder:
